_xResult.title: A Kiss of Black Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made long skirt with pleats
_xResult.longdesc:
For a night at the opera or a formal dinner, you can’t go wrong with this long black taffeta skirt. This custom made piece is designed with function in mind, sporting hidden pockets and a zipper. The double lined skirt and large folds at the waistband complete the look, making it perfect for any elegant affair. One lovely detail we like is the special hem stitching method which uses a hidden reinforced lace on the inside to hold the shape of the skirt out as you walk, so it's naturally full without having to wear special slip undergarments.

You need a skirt made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
